name: El Shaddoll Meshahrail
text:
1 "Shaddoll" monster + 1 DARK monster + 1 EARTH monster
Must be Fusion Summoned. Unaffected by your opponent's activated Spell/Trap effects and by activated effects from opponent's monsters whose original Level/Rank is lower than this card's current Level. Once per turn: You can pay 800 LP; add 1 "Shaddoll" card or "Void" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Shaddoll" monster from your GY.
